48 setCartItems(cartData); 49 } else if(action === 'decrease') { 50 // 减少商品数量 51 if(cartData[itemId][size] > 1) { 52 // 如果数量大于1，则减少1 53 cartData[itemId][size] -= 1; 54 setCartItems(cartData); 55 } else { 56 // 如果数量为1，则调用removeFromCart函数删除商品 57 removeFromCart(itemId, size); IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "backend/controllers/userController.js", "file_content": "import validator from 'validator';\nimport bcrypt from 'bcryptjs';\nimport jwt from 'jsonwebtoken';\nimport userModel from '../models/userModel.js';\n\nconst createToken = (id) => {\n return jwt.sign({ id }, process.env.JWT_SECRET);\n};\n\n// Route for user login\nconst loginUser = async (req, res) => {\n try {\n const { email, password } = req.body;\n\n const user = await userModel.findOne({ email });\n\n if (!user) {\n return res.json({ success: false, message: \"User doesn't exists\" });\n }\n\n const isMatch = await bcrypt.compare(password, user.password);\n\n if (isMatch) {\n const token = createToken(user._id);\n res.json({ success: true, token });\n } else {\n res.json({ success: false, message: 'Invalid credentials' });\n }\n\n } catch (error) {\n console.log(error);\n res.json({ success: false, message: error.message });\n }\n};\n\n// Route for user register\nconst registerUser = async (req, res) => {\n try {\n const { name, email, password } = req.body;\n\n // checking user already exists or not\n const exists = await userModel.findOne({ email });\n if (exists) {\n return res.json({ success: false, message: \"User already exists\" });\n }\n\n // validating email format & strong password\n if (!validator.isEmail(email)) {\n return res.json({ success: false, message: \"Please enter a valid email\" });\n }\n if (password.length < 8) {\n return res.json({ success: false, message: \"Please enter a strong password\" });\n }\n\n // hashing user password\n const salt = await bcrypt.genSalt(10);\n const hashedPassword = await bcrypt.hash(password, salt);\n\n const newUser = new userModel({\n name,\n email,\n password: hashedPassword\n });\n\n const user = await newUser.save();\n\n const token = createToken(user._id);\n\n res.json({ success: true, token });\n\n } catch (error) {\n console.log(error);\n res.json({ success: false, message: error.message });\n }\n};\n\n// Route for admin login\nconst adminLogin = async (req, res) => {\n try {\n const { email, password } = req.body;\n\n if (email === process.env.ADMIN_EMAIL && password === process.env.ADMIN_PASSWORD) {\n const token = jwt.sign(email + password, process.env.JWT_SECRET);\n res.json({ success: true, token });\n } else {\n res.json({ success: false, message: \"Invalid credentials\" });\n }\n\n } catch (error) {\n console.log(error);\n res.json({ success: false, message: error.message });\n }\n};\n\nexport { loginUser, registerUser, adminLogin IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "backend/controllers/productController.js", "file_content": "import { v2 as cloudinary } from 'cloudinary';\nimport productModel from '../models/productModel.js';\n\n// function for add product\nconst addProduct = async (req, res) => {\n try {\n const { name, description, price, category, subCategory, sizes, bestseller } = req.body;\n\n const image1 = req.files.image1 && req.files.image1[0];\n const image2 = req.files.image2 && req.files.image2[0];\n const image3 = req.files.image3 && req.files.image3[0];\n const image4 = req.files.image4 && req.files.image4[0];\n\n const images = [image1, image2, image3, image4].filter((item) => item !== undefined);\n\n let imagesUrl = await Promise.all(\n images.map(async (item) => {\n let result = await cloudinary.uploader.upload(item.path, { resource_type: 'image' });\n return result.secure_url;\n })\n );\n\n const productData = {\n name,\n description,\n category,\n price: Number(price),\n subCategory,\n bestseller: bestseller === \"true\" ? true : false,\n sizes: JSON.parse(sizes),\n image: imagesUrl,\n date: Date.now()\n };\n\n console.log(productData);\n\n const product = new productModel(productData);\n await product.save();\n\n res.json({ success: true, message: \"Product Added\" });\n\n } catch (error) {\n console.log(error);\n res.json({ success: false, message: error.message });\n }\n};\n\n// function for list product\nconst listProducts = async (req, res) => {\n try {\n const products = await productModel.find({});\n res.json({ success: true, products });\n } catch (error) {\n console.log(error);\n res.json({ success: false, message: error.message });\n }\n};\n\n// function for removing product\nconst removeProduct = async (req, res) => {\n try {\n await productModel.findByIdAndDelete(req.body.id);\n res.json({ success: true, message: \"Product Removed\" });\n } catch (error) {\n console.log(error);\n res.json({ success: false, message: error.message });\n }\n};\n\n// function for single product info\nconst singleProduct = async (req, res) => {\n try {\n const { productId } = req.body;\n const product = await productModel.findById(productId);\n res.json({ success: true, product });\n } catch (error) {\n console.log(error);\n res.json({ success: false, message: error.message });\n }\n};\n\nexport { listProducts, addProduct, removeProduct, singleProduct };"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File saved. IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "backend/controllers/cartController.js", "file_content": "import userModel from '../models/userModel.js';\n\n// add products to user cart\nconst addToCart = async (req, res) => {\n try {\n const { userId, itemId, size } = req.body;\n\n const userData = await userModel.findById(userId);\n let cartData = await userData.cartData;\n\n if (cartData[itemId]) {\n if (cartData[itemId][size]) {\n cartData[itemId][size] += 1;\n } else {\n cartData[itemId][size] = 1;\n }\n } else {\n cartData[itemId] = {};\n cartData[itemId][size] = 1;\n }\n\n await userModel.findByIdAndUpdate(userId, { cartData });\n\n res.json({ success: true, message: \"Added To Cart\" });\n\n } catch (error) {\n console.log(error);\n res.json({ success: false, message: error.message });\n }\n};\n\n// update user cart\nconst updateCart = async (req, res) => {\n try {\n const { userId, itemId, size, quantity } = req.body;\n\n const userData = await userModel.findById(userId);\n let cartData = await userData.cartData;\n\n cartData[itemId][size] = quantity;\n\n await userModel.findByIdAndUpdate(userId, { cartData });\n res.json({ success: true, message: \"Cart Updated\" });\n\n } catch (error) {\n console.log(error);\n res.json({ success: false, message: error.message });\n }\n};\n\n// get user cart data\nconst getUserCart = async (req, res) => {\n try {\n const { userId } = req.body;\n\n const userData = await userModel.findById(userId);\n let cartData = await userData.cartData;\n\n res.json({ success: true, cartData });\n\n } catch (error) {\n console.log(error);\n res.json({ success: false, message: error.message });\n }\n};\n\nexport { addToCart, updateCart, getUserCart };"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File saved. IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "backend/controllers/orderController.js", "file_content": "import orderModel from '../models/orderModel.js';\nimport userModel from '../models/userModel.js';\nimport Stripe from 'stripe';\n\n// global variables\nconst currency = 'usd';\nconst deliveryCharge = 10;\n\n// gateway initialize\nconst stripe = new Stripe(process.env.STRIPE_SECRET_KEY);\n\n// Placing orders using COD Method\nconst placeOrder = async (req, res) => {\n try {\n const { userId, items, amount, address } = req.body;\n\n const orderData = {\n userId,\n items,\n address,\n amount,\n paymentMethod: \"COD\",\n payment: false,\n date: Date.now()\n };\n\n const newOrder = new orderModel(orderData);\n await newOrder.save();\n\n await userModel.findByIdAndUpdate(userId, { cartData: {} });\n\n res.json({ success: true, message: \"Order Placed\" });\n\n } catch (error) {\n console.log(error);\n res.json({ success: false, message: error.message });\n }\n};\n\n// Placing orders using Stripe Method\nconst placeOrderStripe = async (req, res) => {\n try {\n const { userId, items, amount, address } = req.body;\n const { origin } = req.headers;\n\n const orderData = {\n userId,\n items,\n address,\n amount,\n paymentMethod: \"Stripe\",\n payment: false,\n date: Date.now()\n };\n\n const newOrder = new orderModel(orderData);\n await newOrder.save();\n\n const line_items = items.map((item) => ({\n price_data: {\n currency: currency,\n product_data: {\n name: item.name\n },\n unit_amount: item.price * 100\n },\n quantity: item.quantity\n }));\n\n line_items.push({\n price_data: {\n currency: currency,\n product_data: {\n name: 'Delivery Charges'\n },\n unit_amount: deliveryCharge * 100\n },\n quantity: 1\n });\n\n const session = await stripe.checkout.sessions.create({\n success_url: `${origin}/verify?success=true&orderId=${newOrder._id}`,\n cancel_url: `${origin}/verify?success=false&orderId=${newOrder._id}`,\n line_items,\n mode: 'payment',\n });\n\n res.json({ success: true, session_url: session.url });\n\n } catch (error) {\n console.log(error);\n res.json({ success: false, message: error.message });\n }\n};\n\n// Verify Stripe\nconst verifyStripe = async (req, res) => {\n const { orderId, success, userId } = req.body;\n\n try {\n if (success === \"true\") {\n await orderModel.findByIdAndUpdate(orderId, { payment: true });\n await userModel.findByIdAndUpdate(userId, { cartData: {} });\n res.json({ success: true });\n } else {\n await orderModel.findByIdAndDelete(orderId);\n res.json({ success: false });\n }\n } catch (error) {\n console.log(error);\n res.json({ success: false, message: error.message });\n }\n};\n\n// All Orders data for Admin Panel\nconst allOrders = async (req, res) => {\n try {\n const orders = await orderModel.find({});\n res.json({ success: true, orders });\n } catch (error) {\n console.log(error);\n res.json({ success: false, message: error.message });\n }\n};\n\n// User Order Data For Frontend\nconst userOrders = async (req, res) => {\n try {\n const { userId } = req.body;\n\n const orders = await orderModel.find({ userId });\n res.json({ success: true, orders });\n\n } catch (error) {\n console.log(error);\n res.json({ success: false, message: error.message });\n }\n};\n\n// update order status from Admin Panel\nconst updateStatus = async (req, res) => {\n try {\n const { orderId, status } = req.body;\n\n await orderModel.findByIdAndUpdate(orderId, { status });\n res.json({ success: true, message: 'Status Updated' });\n\n } catch (error) {\n console.log(error);\n res.json({ success: false, message: error.message });\n }\n};\n\nexport { verifyStripe, placeOrder, placeOrderStripe, allOrders, userOrders, updateStatus };"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File \n\n
\n

Upload Image

\n\n
\n \n \n \n \n
\n
\n\n
\n

Product name

\n setName(e.target.value)} value={name} className='max-w-[500px]' type=\"text\" placeholder='Type here' required/>\n
\n\n
\n

Product description

\n \n
\n\n
\n
\n

Product category

\n \n
\n\n
\n

Sub category

\n \n
\n\n
\n

Product Price

\n setPrice(e.target.value)} value={price} className='max-w-[500px]' type=\"Number\" placeholder='25' required/>\n
\n
\n\n
\n

Product Sizes

\n
\n
setSizes(prev => prev.includes(\"S\") ? prev.filter(item => item !== \"S\") : [...prev, \"S\"])}>\n

S

\n
\n\n
setSizes(prev => prev.includes(\"M\") ? prev.filter(item => item !== \"M\") : [...prev, \"M\"])}>\n

M

\n
\n\n
setSizes(prev => prev.includes(\"L\") ? prev.filter(item => item !== \"L\") : [...prev, \"L\"])}>\n

L

\n
\n\n
setSizes(prev => prev.includes(\"XL\") ? prev.filter(item => item !== \"XL\") : [...prev, \"XL\"])}>\n

XL

\n
\n\n
setSizes(prev => prev.includes(\"XXL\") ? prev.filter(item => item !== \"XXL\") : [...prev, \"XXL\"])}>\n

XXL

\n
\n
\n
\n\n
\n setBestseller(prev => !prev)} checked={bestseller} type=\"checkbox\" id='bestseller' />\n \n
\n\n \n\n
\n )\n}\n\nexport default Add"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File saved. All Products List

\n\n {/* ------- List Table Title ---------- */}\n\n
\n Image\n Name\n Category\n Price\n Action\n

{item.name}

{item.category}

\n

{currency}{item.price}

\n

removeProduct(item._id)} className='cursor-pointer text-lg'>X

\n
\n ))}\n\n
\n \n )\n}\n\nexport default List"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File saved. \n

Order Page

\n {orders.map((order,index)=>(\n
\n \n
\n
\n {order.items.map((item,index)=>{\n if (index === order.items.length - 1) {\n return

{item.name} x {item.quantity} {item.size}

\n }\n else {\n return

{item.name} x {item.quantity} {item.size} ,

\n

{order.address.firstName + \" \" + order.address.lastName}

\n

{order.address.street + \",\"}

\n

\n
\n

{order.address.phone}

\n
\n

Items : {order.items.length}

\n

Method : {order.paymentMethod}

\n

Payment : {order.payment ? 'Done' : 'Pending'}

\n

Date : {new Date(order.date).toLocaleDateString()}

\n
\n

{currency}{order.amount}

\n \n
\n ))}\n
\n

IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "README.md", "file_content": "# E-commerce 全栈应用\n\n这是一个完整的电商应用，包含前端用户界面、后端API服务和管理员面板。\n\n## 项目结构\n\n```\necomence-app/\n├── frontend/ # React前端用户界面\n├── backend/ # Node.js + Express后端API\n├── admin/ # React管理员面板\n├── package.json # 根目录配置\n└── README.md # 项目说明\n```\n\n## 技术栈\n\n### Frontend (前端)\n- React 19\n- Vite\n- React Router DOM\n- Tailwind CSS\n- React Toastify\n\n### Backend (后端)\n- Node.js\n- Express.js\n- MongoDB + Mongoose\n- JWT认证\n- Cloudinary (图片存储)\n- Stripe (支付)\n- Bcrypt (密码加密)\n\n### Admin (管理面板)\n- React 18\n- Vite\n- Axios\n- React Router DOM\n\n## 环境要求\n\n- Node.js 16+\n- MongoDB数据库\n- Cloudinary账户 (用于图片存储)\n- Stripe账户 (用于支付处理)\n\n## 安装和运行\n\n### 1. 克隆项目\n```bash\ngit clone \ncd ecomence-app\n```\n\n### 2. 安装依赖\n\n#### 安装前端依赖\n```bash\ncd frontend\nnpm install\n```\n\n#### 安装后端依赖\n```bash\ncd ../backend\nnpm install\n```\n\n#### 安装管理面板依赖\n```bash\ncd ../admin\nnpm install\n```\n\n### 3. 环境配置\n\n#### Backend环境配置\n在 `backend/.env` 文件中配置以下变量：\n```env\nMONGODB_URI=mongodb+srv://username:password@cluster0.mongodb.net/ecommerce\nCLOUDINARY_NAME=your_cloudinary_name\nCLOUDINARY_API_KEY=your_cloudinary_api_key\nCLOUDINARY_SECRET_KEY=your_cloudinary_secret_key\nJWT_SECRET=your_jwt_secret_key\nADMIN_EMAIL=admin@ecommerce.com\nADMIN_PASSWORD=admin123\nSTRIPE_SECRET_KEY=your_stripe_secret_key\n```\n\n#### Admin环境配置\n在 `admin/.env` 文件中配置：\n```env\nVITE_BACKEND_URL=http://localhost:4000\n```\n\n### 4. 启动应用\n\n#### 方法一：分别启动各个服务\n\n**启动后端服务** (端口: 4000)\n```bash\ncd backend\nnpm run dev\n```\n\n**启动前端应用** (端口: 5173)\n```bash\ncd frontend\nnpm run dev\n```\n\n**启动管理面板** (端口: 5174)\n```bash\ncd admin\nnpm run dev\n```\n\n#### 方法二：使用并发启动 (推荐)\n\n在根目录安装并发工具：\n```bash\nnpm install -g concurrently\n```\n\n然后运行：\n```bash\nnpm run dev\n```\n\n### 5. 访问应用\n\n- **前端用户界面**: http://localhost:5173\n- **管理员面板**: http://localhost:5174\n- **后端API**: http://localhost:4000\n\n## 功能特性\n\n### 前端功能\n- 用户注册/登录\n- 商品浏览和搜索\n- 购物车管理\n- 订单下单\n- 用户订单历史\n- 响应式设计\n\n### 后端功能\n- 用户认证和授权\n- 商品CRUD操作\n- 购物车管理\n- 订单处理\n- 图片上传 (Cloudinary)\n- 支付处理 (Stripe)\n\n### 管理面板功能\n- 管理员登录\n- 商品添加/删除\n- 商品列表管理\n- 订单管理和状态更新\n- 图片上传\n\n## API接口\n\n### 用户相关\n- `POST /api/user/register` - 用户注册\n- `POST /api/user/login` - 用户登录\n- `POST /api/user/admin` - 管理员登录\n\n### 商品相关\n- `GET /api/product/list` - 获取商品列表\n- `POST /api/product/add` - 添加商品 (需要管理员权限)\n- `POST /api/product/remove` - 删除商品 (需要管理员权限)\n- `POST /api/product/single` - 获取单个商品详情\n\n### 购物车相关\n- `POST /api/cart/get` - 获取用户购物车\n- `POST /api/cart/add` - 添加商品到购物车\n- `POST /api/cart/update` - 更新购物车商品数量\n\n### 订单相关\n- `POST /api/order/place` - 下单 (货到付款)\n- `POST /api/order/stripe` - 下单 (Stripe支付)\n- `POST /api/order/userorders` - 获取用户订单\n- `POST /api/order/list` - 获取所有订单 (管理员)\n- `POST /api/order/status` - 更新订单状态 (管理员)\n\n## 部署说明\n\n### 生产环境配置\n\n1. **数据库**: 使用MongoDB Atlas或自建MongoDB服务\n2. **图片存储**: 配置Cloudinary账户\n3. **支付**: 配置Stripe生产环境密钥\n4. **域名**: 更新环境变量中的URL配置\n\n### 构建生产版本\n\n```bash\n# 构建前端\ncd frontend\nnpm run build\n\n# 构建管理面板\ncd ../admin\nnpm run build\n\n# 启动后端生产服务\ncd ../backend\nnpm start\n```\n\n## 故障排除\n\n### 常见问题\n\n1. **端口冲突**: 确保端口4000, 5173, 5174没有被其他应用占用\n2. **数据库连接失败**: 检查MongoDB连接字符串和网络连接\n3. **图片上传失败**: 验证Cloudinary配置信息\n4. **支付失败**: 检查Stripe密钥配置\n\n### 日志查看\n\n- 后端日志: 查看终端输出\n- 前端错误: 打开浏览器开发者工具Console\n- 网络请求: 查看Network标签\n\n## 贡献指南\n\n1. Fork项目\n2. 创建功能分支 (`git checkout -b feature/AmazingFeature`)\n3. 提交更改 (`git commit -m 'Add some AmazingFeature'`)\n4. 推送到分支 (`git push origin feature/AmazingFeature`)\n5. 打开Pull Request\n\n## 许可证\n\n本项目采用MIT许可证 - 查看 [LICENSE](LICENSE) 文件了解详情。"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"Task list updated successfully. tailwindcss @tailwindcss/vite\nnpx tailwindcss init -p", "new_str": "# E-commerce 全栈应用启动指南\n\n## 快速启动（推荐）\n\n### Windows用户：\n双击运行 `start.bat` 文件\n\n### Linux/Mac用户：\n```bash\nchmod +x
